# Results

## xysong demo
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
# source("Utility/utils.R",local = knitr::knit_global())

all_dsets <- read_all()
dumbo <- all_dsets[["dumbo.csv"]]
class(dumbo)
# Elementary statistics
head(dumbo)
# TODO: (Xiaoyang) whether using detailed time or just date?
# dumbo$Datetime <- as.Date(dumbo$Datetime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
date <- head(dumbo)$Datetime[1]
lubridate::floor_date(date, "month")
# Example
dsets <- dumbo %>% dplyr::mutate(Datetime = as.Date(Datetime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"))
head(dsets)


dsets <- dumbo %>%
    dplyr::mutate(Datetime = as.Date(Datetime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(month = lubridate::floor_date(Datetime, "month")) %>%
    dplyr::group_by(month) %>%
    dplyr::summarise(avg = n())

g <- ggplot(
    df %>% filter(Week < as.Date("2016-01-01")),
    aes(Week, `30 yr FRM`)
) +
    geom_line() +
    theme_grey(14)
```
